title: IoT Device Vulnerability Scan
description: An analyst must assess the security of a new IoT device (e.g., a smart camera) before it is approved for corporate use.

tasks.description: Connect the IoT device to an isolated test network.
tasks.expected_outcome: The device is safely isolated for testing.

tasks.description: Run a network vulnerability scanner against the device to identify open ports and known vulnerabilities in its services.
tasks.expected_outcome: The scan reveals the device has an open Telnet port with default credentials.

tasks.description: Fail the device's security review and send a report to the vendor detailing the critical vulnerability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst prevents an insecure device from being added to the network and notifies the vendor.
